package.name: xorg-x11
package.summary: xorg-x11: Fixes Xserver crashes with ATI proprietary driver
package.description: This update fixes Xserver crashes with ATI proprietary driver. Additionally it permits the coexistance of Mesa and NVIDIA driver.
